chunk:
Rosen Skincare Super Smoothie Cleanser (2020 formulation)

Brand: Rosen Skincare

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Rosen Skincare

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Lemon (Citrus Medica Limonum) Powder, Strawberry (Fragaria Vesca) Powder, Raspberry (Rubus Idaeus) Powder, Radish Root (Leuconostoc) Ferment, Lactobacillus & Coconut (Cocos Nucifera) Fruit Extract
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
